title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields. Integration build 09/17. The Info page in the Project Properties dialog is using text fields instead of labels, which looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: The Info page in the Project Properties dialog is using text fields instead of labels.
EB: The Info page in the Project Properties dialog should use labels instead of text fields.
SR:
1. Open the Project Properties dialog.
2. Navigate to the Info page.
3. Observe that the Info page uses text fields instead of labels.
